verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Now thou son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man שָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> sa take up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over צֹ֖ר <S%H6865><s%> tzor for Tyrus קִינָֽה׃ <S%H7015><s%> ki-Nah. a lamentation

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say לְצ֗וֹר <S%H6865><s%> le-Tzor, unto Tyrus; הַיֹּשְׁבֹתֵי hai-yo-she-vo-tei כהַיֹּשֶׁ֙בֶת֙ <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-She-vet abide קעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at מְבוֹאֹ֣ת <S%H3996><s%> me-vo-'Ot the entrance יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam, of the sea רֹכֶ֙לֶת֙ <S%H7402><s%> ro-Che-let [which art] a merchant הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, of the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> 'i-Yim isles רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim; for many כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, GOD צ֕וֹר <S%H6865><s%> Tzor O Tyrus אַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> 'at you אָמַ֔רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mart, thou hast said אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am כְּלִ֥ילַת <S%H3632><s%> ke-Li-lat I [am] of perfect יֹֽפִי׃ <S%H3308><s%> Yo-fi. beauty

בְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> be-Lev [are] in the midst יַמִּ֖ים <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim of the seas גְּבוּלָ֑יִךְ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-La-yich; Thy borders בֹּנַ֕יִךְ <S%H1129><s%> bo-Na-yich thy builders כָּלְל֖וּ <S%H3634><s%> kal-Lu have perfected יָפְיֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3308><s%> ya-fe-Yech. thy beauty

בְּרוֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H1265><s%> be-ro-Shim of fir trees מִשְּׂנִיר֙ <S%H8149><s%> mis-se-Nir of Senir בָּ֣נוּ <S%H1129><s%> Ba-nu They have made לָ֔ךְ Lach, אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all לֻֽחֹתָ֑יִם <S%H3871><s%> lu-cho-Ta-yim; all thy [ship] boards אֶ֤רֶז <S%H730><s%> 'E-rez cedars מִלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> mil-le-va-nOn from Lebanon לָקָ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> la-Ka-chu, they have taken לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to make תֹּ֖רֶן <S%H8650><s%> To-ren masts עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich. of

אַלּוֹנִים֙ <S%H437><s%> al-lo-Nim [Of] the oaks מִבָּ֔שָׁן <S%H1316><s%> mib-Ba-shon, of Bashan עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su have they made מִשּׁוֹטָ֑יִךְ <S%H4880><s%> mish-sho-Ta-yich; thine oars קַרְשֵׁ֤ךְ <S%H7175><s%> kar-Shech thy benches עָֽשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-su- have made שֵׁן֙ <S%H8127><s%> shen [of] ivory בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the company אֲשֻׁרִ֔ים <S%H839><s%> 'a-shu-Rim, of the Ashurites מֵאִיֵּ֖י <S%H339><s%> me-'i-Yei [brought] out of the isles; כִּתִּיִּם kit-ti-yim ככִּתִּיִּֽים׃ <S%H3794><s%> kit-ti-Yim. Chittim ק

שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8336><s%> shesh- Fine linen בְּרִקְמָ֤ה <S%H7553><s%> be-rik-Mah with broidered work מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim from Egypt הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah became מִפְרָשֵׂ֔ךְ <S%H4666><s%> mif-ra-Sech, was that which thou spreadest forth לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot became לָ֖ךְ lach לְנֵ֑ס <S%H5251><s%> le-Nes; to be thy sail תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple מֵאִיֵּ֥י <S%H339><s%> me-'i-Yei from the isles אֱלִישָׁ֖ה <S%H473><s%> 'e-li-Shah of Elishah הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah became מְכַסֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H4374><s%> me-chas-Sech. was that which covered

יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei The inhabitants צִידוֹן֙ <S%H6721><s%> tzi-dOn of Zidon וְאַרְוַ֔ד <S%H719><s%> ve-'ar-Vad, and Arvad הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become שָׁטִ֖ים <S%H7751><s%> sha-Tim were thy mariners לָ֑ךְ Lach; חֲכָמַ֤יִךְ <S%H2450><s%> cha-cha-Ma-yich thy wise צוֹר֙ <S%H6865><s%> tzOr [men] O Tyrus הָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yu become בָ֔ךְ Vach, הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they חֹבְלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H2259><s%> choe-La-yich. [that] were in thee were thy pilots

זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei The ancients גְבַ֤ל <S%H1380><s%> ge-Val of Gebal וַחֲכָמֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H2450><s%> va-cha-cha-Mei-ha and the wise הָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yu become בָ֔ךְ Vach, מַחֲזִיקֵ֖י <S%H2388><s%> ma-cha-zi-Kei repairing בִּדְקֵ֑ךְ <S%H919><s%> bid-Kech; your seams כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֳנִיּ֨וֹת <S%H591><s%> o-ni-Yot all the ships הַיָּ֤ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam of the sea וּמַלָּֽחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4419><s%> u-mal-la-chei-Hem with their mariners הָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yu become בָ֔ךְ Vach, לַעֲרֹ֖ב <S%H6148><s%> la-'a-Ro were in thee to occupy מַעֲרָבֵֽךְ׃ <S%H4627><s%> ma-'a-ra-Vech. thy merchandise

פָּרַ֨ס <S%H6539><s%> pa-Ras They of Persia וְל֤וּד <S%H3865><s%> ve-Lud and of Lud וּפוּט֙ <S%H6316><s%> u-Fut and of Phut הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu were in בְחֵילֵ֔ךְ <S%H2428><s%> ve-chei-Lech, were in thine army אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei your men מִלְחַמְתֵּ֑ךְ <S%H4421><s%> mil-cham-Tech; of war מָגֵ֤ן <S%H4043><s%> ma-Gen the shield וְכוֹבַע֙ <S%H3553><s%> ve-cho-Va' and helmet תִּלּוּ־ <S%H8518><s%> til-lu- they hanged בָ֔ךְ Vach, הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu in thee they set forth הֲדָרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1926><s%> ha-da-Rech. thy comeliness

בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The men אַרְוַ֣ד <S%H719><s%> 'ar-Vad of Arvad וְחֵילֵ֗ךְ <S%H2428><s%> ve-chei-Lech, with thine army עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- were on חוֹמוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H2346><s%> cho-mo-Ta-yich [were] upon thy walls סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about וְגַ֨מָּדִ֔ים <S%H1575><s%> ve-Gam-ma-Dim, and the Gammadims בְּמִגְדְּלוֹתַ֖יִךְ <S%H4026><s%> be-mig-de-lo-Ta-yich were in thy towers הָי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu; become שִׁלְטֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H7982><s%> shil-tei-Hem their shields תִּלּ֤וּ <S%H8518><s%> til-Lu they hanged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on חוֹמוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H2346><s%> cho-mo-Ta-yich upon thy walls סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they כָּלְל֥וּ <S%H3634><s%> kal-Lu perfect יָפְיֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3308><s%> ya-fe-Yech. thy beauty

תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> tar-Shish Tarshish סֹחַרְתֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5503><s%> so-char-Tech [was] thy merchant מֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> me-Ro by reason of the multitude כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all ה֑וֹן <S%H1952><s%> Hon; of all [kind of] riches בְּכֶ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> be-Che-sef with silver בַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> bar-Zel iron בְּדִ֣יל <S%H913><s%> be-Dil tin וְעוֹפֶ֔רֶת <S%H5777><s%> ve-'o-Fe-ret, and lead נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu they traded עִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5801><s%> iz-vo-Na-yich. in thy fairs

יָוָ֤ן <S%H3120><s%> ya-Van Javan תֻּבַל֙ <S%H8422><s%> tu-Val Tubal וָמֶ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> va-Me-shech, and Meshech הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they רֹֽכְלָ֑יִךְ <S%H7402><s%> ro-che-La-yich; they [were] thy merchants בְּנֶ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> be-Ne-fesh the persons אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of men וּכְלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> u-che-Lei and vessels נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet, of brass נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu they traded מַעֲרָבֵֽךְ׃ <S%H4627><s%> ma-'a-ra-Vech. in thy market

מִבֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit They of the house תּוֹגַרְמָ֑ה <S%H8425><s%> to-gar-Mah; of Togarmah סוּסִ֤ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim with horses וּפָֽרָשִׁים֙ <S%H6571><s%> u-fa-ra-Shim and horsemen וּפְרָדִ֔ים <S%H6505><s%> u-fe-ra-Dim, and mules נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu traded עִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5801><s%> iz-vo-Na-yich. in thy fairs

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The men דְדָן֙ <S%H1719><s%> de-Dan of Dedan רֹֽכְלַ֔יִךְ <S%H7402><s%> ro-che-La-yich, [were] thy merchants אִיִּ֥ים <S%H339><s%> 'i-Yim isles רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim many סְחֹרַ֣ת <S%H5506><s%> se-cho-Rat [were] the merchandise יָדֵ֑ךְ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dech; of thine hand קַרְנ֥וֹת <S%H7161><s%> kar-Not horns שֵׁן֙ <S%H8127><s%> shen of ivory; וְהֹובְנִים ve-hov-nim כוְהָבְנִ֔ים <S%H1894><s%> ve-ha-ve-Nim, ebony קהֵשִׁ֖יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> he-Shi-vu they brought אֶשְׁכָּרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H814><s%> 'esh-ka-Rech. thee [for] a present

אֲרָ֥ם <S%H758><s%> 'a-Ram Syria סֹחַרְתֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5503><s%> so-char-Tech [was] thy merchant מֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> me-Ro by reason of the multitude מַעֲשָׂ֑יִךְ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sa-yich; of the wares of thy making בְּ֠נֹפֶךְ <S%H5306><s%> Be-no-fech with emeralds אַרְגָּמָ֨ן <S%H713><s%> 'ar-ga-Man purple וְרִקְמָ֤ה <S%H7553><s%> ve-rik-Mah and broidered work וּבוּץ֙ <S%H948><s%> u-Vutz and fine linen וְרָאמֹ֣ת <S%H7215><s%> ve-ra-Mot and coral וְכַדְכֹּ֔ד <S%H3539><s%> ve-chad-Kod, and agate נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu they occupied בְּעִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5801><s%> be-'iz-vo-Na-yich. in thy fairs

יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah וְאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-'E-retz and the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they רֹכְלָ֑יִךְ <S%H7402><s%> ro-che-La-yich; they [were] thy merchants בְּחִטֵּ֣י <S%H2406><s%> be-chit-Tei wheat מִ֠נִּית <S%H4511><s%> Min-nit of Minnith וּפַנַּ֨ג <S%H6436><s%> u-fan-Nag and Pannag וּדְבַ֤שׁ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash and honey וָשֶׁ֙מֶן֙ <S%H8081><s%> va-She-men and oil וָצֹ֔רִי <S%H6875><s%> va-Tzo-ri, and balm נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu they traded מַעֲרָבֵֽךְ׃ <S%H4627><s%> ma-'a-ra-Vech. in thy market

דַּמֶּ֧שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> dam-Me-sek Damascus סֹחַרְתֵּ֛ךְ <S%H5503><s%> so-char-Tech [was] thy merchant בְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro in the multitude מַעֲשַׂ֖יִךְ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sa-yich of the wares of thy making מֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> me-Ro for the multitude כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all ה֑וֹן <S%H1952><s%> Hon; of all riches בְּיֵ֥ין <S%H3196><s%> be-Yein in the wine חֶלְבּ֖וֹן <S%H2463><s%> chel-Bon of Helbon וְצֶ֥מֶר <S%H6785><s%> ve-Tze-mer wool צָֽחַר׃ <S%H6713><s%> Tza-char. and white

וְדָ֤ן <S%H1835><s%> ve-Dan Dan וְיָוָן֙ <S%H3120><s%> ve-ya-Van also and Javan מְאוּזָּ֔ל <S%H235><s%> me-'uz-Zal, going to and fro בְּעִזְבוֹנַ֖יִךְ <S%H5801><s%> be-'iz-vo-Na-yich in thy fairs נָתָ֑נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan-nu; occupied בַּרְזֶ֤ל <S%H1270><s%> bar-Zel iron עָשׁוֹת֙ <S%H6219><s%> 'a-shOt bright קִדָּ֣ה <S%H6916><s%> kid-Dah cassia וְקָנֶ֔ה <S%H7070><s%> ve-ka-Neh, and calamus בְּמַעֲרָבֵ֖ךְ <S%H4627><s%> be-ma-'a-ra-Vech were in thy market הָיָֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah. become

דְּדָן֙ <S%H1719><s%> de-Dan Dedan רֹֽכַלְתֵּ֔ךְ <S%H7402><s%> ro-chal-Tech, [was] thy merchant בְבִגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> ve-vig-dei- clothes חֹ֖פֶשׁ <S%H2667><s%> Cho-fesh in precious לְרִכְבָּֽה׃ <S%H7396><s%> le-rich-Bah. for chariots

עֲרַב֙ <S%H6152><s%> 'a-Rav Arabia וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'Ei and all the princes קֵדָ֔ר <S%H6938><s%> ke-Dar, of Kedar הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they סֹחֲרֵ֣י <S%H5503><s%> so-cha-Rei in these [were they] thy merchants יָדֵ֑ךְ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dech; with thee בְּכָרִ֤ים <S%H3733><s%> be-cha-Rim in lambs וְאֵילִים֙ <S%H352><s%> ve-'ei-Lim and rams וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <S%H6260><s%> ve-'at-tu-Dim, and goats בָּ֖ם bam סֹחֲרָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5503><s%> so-cha-Ra-yich. were your customers

רֹכְלֵ֤י <S%H7402><s%> ro-che-Lei The merchants שְׁבָא֙ <S%H7614><s%> she-Va of Sheba וְרַעְמָ֔ה <S%H7484><s%> ve-ra'-Mah, and Raamah הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they רֹכְלָ֑יִךְ <S%H7402><s%> ro-che-La-yich; they [were] thy merchants בְּרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> be-Rosh with chief כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all בֹּ֜שֶׂם <S%H1314><s%> Bo-sem of all spices וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all אֶ֤בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven stones יְקָרָה֙ <S%H3368><s%> ye-ka-Rah and with all precious וְזָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav, and gold נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu they occupied עִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5801><s%> iz-vo-Na-yich. in thy fairs
